name: Traffic Racer: Burnout
description:
Wreck the traffic, make them explode, turn the place upside down. Here is brand new Traffic Racer : Burnout.

This is the new game for speed lovers.
You can wreck cars while speeding on highway or burnout by exploding your car.

You are the danger. Download Traffic Racer : Burnout for free now.

GAME FEATURES

- 14 great levels
- 7 cars and truck (Sport car, classical car, race car, mini car)
- Special designed bombs
- 2 different maps
- Realistic traffic system
- Real gravity and physics.
- Pedestrian traffic
- Realistic damage and pileups.
- Perfect HD graphics
- Real car sounds
- 10 different cam angle.
- Realistic steering wheel ( Each wheel is designed special for a car. Every car has a different driving.)
- Perfect car physic and car simulation
- Different weather conditions ( Rainy, snowy, smoggy, cloudy, special weather conditions)
- Night and day car driving.
- Car Drive on the highway traffic
- Large City Maps


GAMEPLAY INSTRUCTIONS

- Tilt or Touch to steer
- Touch gas button to accelerate
- Touch brake button to slow down

TIPS

- More you damage traffic, more money you get.

Brace yourself to fun with the newest, unique Traffic Racer : Burnout game of 2015.
publishers: ZUUKS BILISIM HIZMETLERI SANAYI VE TICARET LIMITED SIRKETI
